title: Reopening Anxiety (with Andy McDonald MP)
itunes:title: Reopening Anxiety (with Andy McDonald MP)
description:
Andy McDonald, Labour MP for Middlesbrough, says the prime minister's credibility has been shot to pieces by trying to avoid self-isolation rules and the government has abandoned responsibility.

Microbiologist Dr. Arthur Hosie, at the University of Staffordshire, says the government should delay reopening by at least month and follow Scotland's more cautious path.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
